text: Gauthier Destenay, the husband of Luxembourg ’ s Prime Minister Xavier Bettel, ate dinner and toured a museum with the wives of other NATO nation leaders. Standing among global first ladies like Melania Trump and France's Brigitte Macron, Luxembourg's proud ` ` first gentleman'' Gauthier Destenay represented his nation at the Brussels NATO summit on Thursday. Destenay, a 44 - year - old architect originally from Belgium, is the husband of Xavier Bettel, the prime minister of Luxembourg since December 2013. The men married in 2015 after the small European nation legalized same - sex marriage, People reports.
